cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 bed dorm,quality linnen & mattreses, sturdy bunks.Heater in room , all windows double glazed. Warm and cosy. Free breakfast between 7.30am and 9.00 am. Free WIFI, spa and bicycles

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: *Please note this room is in our Caravan located on site* Featuring double bed, free toiletries, heater, linen and towels provided. Shared bathroom facilities in separate building.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

privates.labelDescription: A Queen size bed, fully made up with quality linen. Electric blanket,heater and double glazed windows opening onto a terrace overlooking the harbour. Free UNLIMITED WIFI in room and common areas.Free breakfast, spa and bicycle use.

privates.labelDescription:
Twin beds - both booked together. Patio and views of harbour
Complete with electric blankets,heater, towels, soap and shampoo, FREE UNLIMITED WiFi. breakfast, usage of spa and bikes.
